definitions.definition: A sentence or inscription whose letters , when interpreted according to a system (such as Roman numerals ) in which letters correspond to numeric values, stand for a particular date (usually the date of inscription) when rearranged.
A phylogenetic tree that has branch spans proportional to evolutionary time.

main_definition: A sentence or inscription whose letters , when interpreted according to a system (such as Roman numerals ) in which letters correspond to numeric values, stand for a particular date (usually the date of inscription) when rearranged.
secondary_definitions: ( genetics ) A phylogenetic tree that has branch spans proportional to evolutionary time.
